name: Second Movement: The Faun's Breakfast
desc: After any ally target attacks any Weakness Broken enemy targets, triggers 1 instance of "Harmonize" DMG in a 8% ratio.
enhanced_desc: After any ally target attacks any Weakness Broken enemy targets, triggers 1 instance of "Harmonize" DMG with a ratio of 10%, increasing the "Harmonize" DMG multiplier by 20% of the original multiplier.
